channel.title: Connecting to server problem
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm running the server on my other computer whilst I go on this computer, they're both linked to the same router.
I can log on the server if I'm using the computer which is running the server but on this computer it will not let me log on at all,
I've tried all IP's such as: 0.0.0.0, 127.0.0.1, MY IP, gravescape.no-ip.org
Is there a way for me to log on the server without being on the same computer which is running the server?
Thanks for your help in advance.

item.title: Connecting to server problem
item.dc:creator: @bcfcrule11 bcfcrule11
item.description:
@bcfcrule11 wrote:

Hey,

I’m running the server on my other computer whilst I go on this computer, they’re both linked to the same router.

I can log on the server if I’m using the computer which is running the server but on this computer it will not let me log on at all,

I’ve tried all IP’s such as:
0.0.0.0,
127.0.0.1,
MY IP,
gravescape.no-ip.org

Is there a way for me to log on the server without being on the same computer which is running the server?

Thanks for your help in advance.
